blogPost.excerpt: This is my first 3D illustration pack, I've prepared 15 3D hand gestures in cartoon style that can be used for user interfaces, social media posts, presentations, infographics and banners.
blogPost.body: This is my first 3D illustration pack, I've prepared 15 3D hand gestures in cartoon style that can be used for user interfaces, social media posts, presentations, infographics and banners.
blogPost.title: 3D Hand Gestures - Cute hand gestures for your designs.
blogPost.author: Barış

localize.description: 这是我的第一个3D插图包，我已经准备了15个卡通风格的3D手势，可以用于用户界面、社交媒体帖子、演示文稿、信息图表和横幅。
這是我的第一個3D插圖包，我已經準備了15個卡通風格的3D手勢，可以用於用戶界面、社交媒體帖子、演示文稿、信息圖表和橫幅。

previous.excerpt: SnapSmile is an app that uses your eating habits + images of your teeth to provide you with the insights, and recommendations you need to improve your oral health at home. Think of SnapSmile like your own Dental Coach.
previous.title: SnapSmile - We use machine learning to help improve your dental health

localize.description: SnapSmilar是一款应用程序，它使用你的饮食习惯+你的牙齿图像，为你提供改善家里口腔健康所需的洞察力和建议。把SnapSmilar想象成你自己的牙科教练。
localize.tagline: 我们使用机器学习来帮助改善您的牙齿健康

localize.description: SnapSmilar是一款應用程序，它使用你的飲食習慣+你的牙齒圖像，爲你提供改善家裏口腔健康所需的洞察力和建議。把SnapSmilar想象成你自己的牙科教練。
localize.tagline: 我們使用機器學習來幫助改善您的牙齒健康
